<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="sys_script"> <sys_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"> <abort_action>false</abort_action> <access>package_private</access> <action_delete>true</action_delete> <action_insert>false</action_insert> <action_query>false</action_query> <action_update>false</action_update> <active>true</active> <add_message>false</add_message> <advanced>true</advanced> <change_fields>false</change_fields> <client_callable>false</client_callable> <collection>sn_wsd_core_workplace_entity</collection> <condition/> <description/> <execute_function>false</execute_function> <filter_condition/> <is_rest>false</is_rest> <message/> <name>Prevent delet of entity which isn't leaf</name> <order>100</order> <priority>100</priority> <rest_method/> <rest_method_text/> <rest_service/> <rest_service_text/> <rest_variables/> <role_conditions/> <script><![CDATA[(function executeRule(current, previous /*null when async*/ ) {
// Add your code here var workplaceEntitySysId = current.getValue('sys_id'); var isLeafEntity = new WPEntityUtils().isLeafEntity(workplaceEntitySysId); if (!isLeafEntity) { current.setAbortAction(true); gs.addErrorMessage(gs.getMessage('Deletion of workplace entity which is referenced by another workplace entity is not allowed.')); }
})(current, previous);]]></script> <sys_class_name>sys_script</sys_class_name> <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by> <sys_created_on>2023-07-24 10:45:45</sys_created_on> <sys_domain>global</sys_domain> <sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path> <sys_id>313628a04390311037a2b61af9b8f2bc</sys_id> <sys_mod_count>4</sys_mod_count> <sys_name>Prevent delet of entity which isn't leaf</sys_name> <sys_overrides/> <sys_package display_value="">a208b07253201010b10bddeeff7b1281</sys_package> <sys_policy/> <sys_scope display_value="">a208b07253201010b10bddeeff7b1281</sys_scope> <sys_update_name>sys_script_313628a04390311037a2b61af9b8f2bc</sys_update_name> <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by> <sys_updated_on>2023-09-13 09:40:59</sys_updated_on> <template/> <when>before</when> </sys_script> <sys_translated_text action="delete_multiple" query="documentkey=313628a04390311037a2b61af9b8f2bc"/> </record_update>
